unnormalised: Python dev khātir sabhāwān IDE kyā chhū, VS Code chhu mashhūr, tiyāch chhū sahi wajah. Microsoft-ananz Python extension install karī saken, yus linting, debugging, ti auto-completion farāham karan. Plus, yus virtual environments manzī bhī sahi tarīqā sāth madad karan - bas terminal manzī 'python -m venv .venv' type kar. PyCharm bhī āchha chhū, khāsan Professional edition, magar VS Code chhu muft ti bahut customize karī saken. Pip version 23.0 yā zyādā install karīnā bīyī dependency issue bachāvīnā khatir.
normalised: Python D-E-V khatir behtareen I-D-E-n manz V-S Code chhu mashhoor, tey ehund waja chhu. Tuss Microsoft-un hund Python extension install karith sakan, yus linting, debugging, tey auto-completion faraham karann. Alawa, yus virtual environment-an manz chhu bohut wariya soopordh karann - sirf type kar 'python hyphen m v-e-n-v dot v-e-n-v' terminal manz. PyCharm chhi bhi behtareen, khastitan Professional edition, magar V-S Code chhu muft tey bohat zyada customizable. Na chhi bhulun pip version twenty three point zero ya zyada install karan taaki dependency maslan bachav thavan.
text: Python developement-as chu sabsi manz behtar IDE-as manz, VS Code chhu mashhoor, athi chhi karan. Tussi Microsoft-ich Python extension install kari sakni, yus linting, debugging, te auto-completion faraham karan. Plus, yi virtual environments-an manz bi chaangi madad karan - sirf terminal-as manz 'python hyphen -m venv dot .venv' type karo. PyCharm bi chhu bhadur, khas kar professional edition, magar VS Code chhu free te be had customizable. Pip version 23.0 ya athi nasli install karan na bhoolo taki dependency issues batao.
